body:
Hi Michael,
I had some problem on OSX 10.5.8 but I think this should work on OSX 10.6.8
too.
I guess that by "ulimit -S -n 4096" you don't set it permanently.


Go to .bash_profile or create it in your home folder if you don't have it
there and just insert following


ulimit -n 2306


or higher number of open files if you need.


Hope it will help
David
